byline.contributor: Farooq Jan Mangal contributed reporting from Khost, Afghanistan.

abstract: Pentagon officials say American airstrike in Afghanistan has killed Abu Khalil al-Sudani, Qaeda operative overseeing suicide bombings and explosives attacks.
lead_paragraph: Abu Khalil al-Sudani, said to have directed suicide bombings and other operations with explosives, was killed on July 11 in Afghanistan, the military reported.

headline.main: Al Qaeda’s Chief of Bombing Attacks Died in U.S. Strike, Pentagon Says
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Afghanistan: Qaeda Operative Killed in July 11 Strike, U.S. Says

snippet: Abu Khalil al-Sudani, said to have directed suicide bombings and other operations with explosives, was killed on July 11 in Afghanistan, the military reported.
